data.name: AvailabilitySetRemovalCaption
data.value: Availability set removal operation

data.name: AvailabilitySetRemovalConfirmation
data.value: This cmdlet will remove the specified availability set. Do you want to continue?

data.name: BothWindowsAndLinuxConfigurationsSpecified
data.value: Cannot specify both Windows and Linux configurations.

data.name: CustomScriptExtensionTryToUseTheFirstSpecifiedFileAsRunScript
data.value: No Run File has been assigned, and the Custom Script extension will try to use the first specified File Name as the Run File.

data.name: VirtualMachineExtensionRemovalCaption
data.value: Virtual machine extension removal operation

data.name: VirtualMachineExtensionRemovalConfirmation
data.value: This cmdlet will remove the specified virtual machine extension. Do you want to continue?

data.name: VirtualMachineNotAssociatedWithPublicIPOrPublicLoadBalancer
data.value: The RDP file cannot be generated because the network interface of the virtual machine does not reference a PublicIP or an InboundNatRule of a public load balancer.

data.name: VirtualMachineNotAssociatedWithPublicLoadBalancer
data.value: The RDP file cannot be generated because the network interface of the virtual machine does not reference an InboundNatRule of a public load balancer.

data.name: VirtualMachineReferencesInternalNetworkInterface
data.value: The RDP file cannot be generated because the network interface of the virtual machine does not reference a PublicIP or an InboungNatRule of the load balancer.

data.name: VirtualMachineRemovalCaption
data.value: Virtual machine removal operation

data.name: VirtualMachineRemovalConfirmation
data.value: This cmdlet will remove the specified virtual machine. Do you want to continue?

data.name: VirtualMachineStoppingCaption
data.value: Virtual machine stopping operation

data.name: VirtualMachineStoppingConfirmation
data.value: This cmdlet will stop the specified virtual machine. Do you want to continue?
